text: Shaytan, sklonyaya vas k vinu, p'yanstvu i k azartnym igram, khochet lish' poseyat' sredi vas raznoglasiya, vrazhdu i nenavist', pytayas' oslabit' vas, narushit' druzhbu i soglasiye mezhdu vami, otvratit' vas ot very v Allakha, pokloneniya Yemu i ot molitvy. Togda vasha budushchaya zhizn' budet takoy zhe skvernoy, kak vasha nastoyashchaya zhizn'. Uznav ob etikh merzkikh deyaniyakh, zapreshchonnykh vam, otstranites' ot nikh, chtoby ne dat' vozmozhnosti shaytanu dostich' svoikh durnykh namereniy
